long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Popup allows users to invoke an AI assistant at any location on a webpage, and respond based on the content that the user selects. It provides different AI agents in a simple agent marketplace. Users can enable agents as needed. Once an agent is enabled, it will be added to the context menus. Then, the user can right-click on the selection in the web page and select the agent to interact with the content.
